name: Shadow of the Samurai
description:
Description:

Shadow of the Samurai is a platform game with strong Japanese influences. Take the role of Rogue Samurai, as he ventures across lush autumn landscapes. battling many foes in his quest to put a stop to the dark powerful lord, and to find out the true meaning behind his evil past.

Features:

  • Play the game. Its all free, No additional costs, no hidden fees.
  • Handcrafted pumped-up pixel style. A labor of love!
  • beautiful authentic pixel style bridges the gap between yesterday and today.
  • Perfect your platforming skills as you take down many enemies and bosses!

Games Website:

http://harisonkilgour.wix.com/shadowots
